classes.name: martialArtist
classes.label: Martial Artist
classes.description: Master of melee combat; stealthy, quick.

classes.name: netrunner
classes.label: Netrunner
classes.description: Hacker; bit of a thief. Can disable security systems. Uses a unique mix of martial arts and technology in combat.

classes.name: mercenary
classes.label: Mercenary
classes.description: Heavy weapons and explosives expert. Specialize in AOE damage with rockets and grenades or individual damage with sniper rifles.

classes.name: technomancer
classes.label: Technomancer
classes.description: Use implants and cybernetic augmentations to simulate magic.

classes.name: exsoldier
classes.label: Ex-Soldier
classes.description: Assault rifles and flash grenades. Suppressive fire and generally keeping enemies at bay to protect allies.

classes.name: bodyguard
classes.label: Bodyguard
classes.description: Can take a hit and keep enemies focused on them while disabling them with stunning blows and disarms.

classes.name: machinist
classes.label: Machinist
classes.description: Uses light weaponry when necessary, but would rather cause disruption with traps, turrets and robots.

classes.name: scientist
classes.label: Scientist
classes.description: Assists allies by providing buffs through chemicals and stim needles; can deploy energy field shields. Its main weapon is a dart gun.

classes.name: medic
classes.label: Medic
classes.description: Heals allies with bandages and tourniquets. A quick healer.
